item.title: “MAGICAL MIRAI 2020” Osaka Accomodation Plan Applications Closed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
On April 1st, the Magical Mirai official Twitter account revealed the accomodation options planned for the MAGICAL MIRAI 2020 Osaka event were cancelled for those outside of Japan due to the ongoing COVID-19 outbreak. 【海外在住の方へお知らせ】「マジカルミライ 2020」宿泊プランについてhttps://t.co/o8bynkCrq2#マジカルミライ2020　#初音ミク — 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) April 2, 2020 Read the official statement below: “The World Health Organization (WHO) has …

The post “MAGICAL MIRAI 2020” Osaka Accomodation Plan Applications Closed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On April 1st, the Magical Mirai official Twitter account revealed the accomodation options planned for the MAGICAL MIRAI 2020 Osaka event were cancelled for those outside of Japan due to the ongoing COVID-19 outbreak.

【海外在住の方へお知らせ】
「マジカルミライ 2020」宿泊プランについてhttps://t.co/o8bynkCrq2#マジカルミライ2020　#初音ミク

— 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) April 2, 2020

Read the official statement below:

“The World Health Organization (WHO) has formally declared the Coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak as a pandemic. We had been preparing infectious disease control for those who applied for the MAGICAL MIRAI 2020 in Osaka Accommodation Plan, but in order to prevent the spread of the COVID-19 we came to a decision to close applications for those located overseas.

Therefore, we will be only accepting applications from those who live in Japan. Thank you for your understanding and your cooperation.”

So now you know! Be very careful if you’re in Japan, make sure to follow the health etiquette, and do not place yourself at risk by going out unless absolutely necessary!

Please continue to read our other articles here at VNN, we’re glad to have you with us.

Sources

Magical Mirai on Twitter

The post “MAGICAL MIRAI 2020” Osaka Accomodation Plan Applications Closed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: TextAlive technology brings lyrics to life at Magical Mirai!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
TextAlive recently collaborated with Magical Mirai to bring lyrics to life live on stage using their technology! Let’s find out more about this exciting opportunity for creators. What is TextAlive? TextAlive is a production support service, which allows you to quickly create animated lyrics for music videos and share them online. It has been continuously updated …

The post TextAlive technology brings lyrics to life at Magical Mirai! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
TextAlive recently collaborated with Magical Mirai to bring lyrics to life live on stage using their technology! Let’s find out more about this exciting opportunity for creators.

What is TextAlive?

TextAlive is a production support service, which allows you to quickly create animated lyrics for music videos and share them online. It has been continuously updated with features that focus on the creator, such as a private upload function and the ability to import VSQX files from VOCALOID, to get timing information for the lyrics.

TextAlive also supports high-quality video exporting, such as the HD MP4 format.

TextAlive Course

At both the Osaka and Tokyo performances of Magical Mirai, TextAlive held a course to inform producers on how to use this technology for their own productions.

The Osaka course ran from 13:00 – 14:00 on Saturday 10th August, while the Tokyo course ran from 17:00 – 18:00 on Saturday 31st August. (Miku’s anniversary!)

During the course, BIGHEAD gave a talk on the future of creative culture.

Missed out on the talk? Don’t worry! You can watch the presentation with BIGHEAD below.

There was also a special exhibition at the Tokyo event, where VJ apapico demonstrated how he used the technology for live VJ performances.

Check out the video below to see him in action, playing one of BIGHEAD’s songs, ‘ACE OF SPADES‘ feat. Hatsune Miku.

Examples of TextAlive Usage

Now that you know a little more about TextAlive, let’s take a look at some examples.

In this first set of examples, TextAlive shows a comparison of two versions of the video for ‘A plan is still in progress, covertly‘ by Shinra feat. Hatsune Miku.

This is the original video produced with TextAlive:

And this is the final version of the video after further editing:

And now, for the main event!

At Magical Mirai 2019, the following video was projected on a large display above the live stage, as a background video to the performance of ‘Main Character‘ by Luna feat. Kagamine Len.

The visualisations of the lyrics are mesmerising!

More Information

It is exciting to see how technology is constantly improving to assist producers in their creative pursuits. As always, keep an eye on VNN for further updates on this and other technologies which can further enrich your vocal synth experience!

And don’t forget to check out TextAlive’s social media and website if you are interested in hearing about any new developments with their service.

TextAlive Twitter

TextAlive Website

Source

TextAlive Blog

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post TextAlive technology brings lyrics to life at Magical Mirai! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open!
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
With the end of Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019’s preseale of the Magical Mirai 2018 ver. Nendoroid, that means online preorders are now open! Miku from Magical Mirai 2018 has arrived! From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing her outfit from the Magical Mirai 2018 main visual illustration! …

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the end of Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019’s preseale of the Magical Mirai 2018 ver. Nendoroid, that means online preorders are now open!

Miku from Magical Mirai 2018 has arrived!
From “Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku” comes a Nendoroid of Hatsune Miku wearing her outfit from the Magical Mirai 2018 main visual illustration! Illustrator Mika Pikazo’s colorful and upbeat version of Miku has been brought to life.

She comes with three face plates including an energetic standard expression, a smiling expression and a winking expression often seen during concerts! Her school uniform themed outfit has been perfectly recreated in Nendoroid size. Her megaphone mic decorated with a cube and balloons is included. Both a stand type and handheld megaphone are included allowing for various different poses. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Preorders for this nendoroid will be available from Good Smile Company’s online shop until October 3rd at 12:00 PM JST, and has a price of 5,093 JPY ($48.99 USD). The expected shipping period is around February 2020.

Check out more photos by Kahotan on her review of the figure! → https://mikatan.goodsmile.info/en/2019/08/30/nendoroid-hatsune-miku-magical-mirai-2018-ver/

> Nendoroid Product page
> Nendoroid Preorder page

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 Ver. Preorders Now Open! appeared first on VNN.

With the passing of the final performance in Tokyo, Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 has finally came to a close, and the Tokyo concert setlist is also now online, thanks to the tweets by @jt4mtb. While bearing many similarities to Osaka’s, we’d like you to personally check out the Tokyo concert setlist below. For those who may be interested, preorders for …

The post Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Tokyo Concert Setlist (Spoilers!), Magical Mirai 2020 Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the passing of the final performance in Tokyo, Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 has finally came to a close, and the Tokyo concert setlist is also now online, thanks to the tweets by @jt4mtb. While bearing many similarities to Osaka’s, we’d like you to personally check out the Tokyo concert setlist below.

For those who may be interested, preorders for Blu-ray & DVD are still open on AmiAmi and CDJapan, featuring complete recording of the final show in Tokyo including the encore. Check out our Osaka concert setlist article for more details → https://www.mikufan.com/?p=27962

Magical Mirai 2019 https://magicalmirai.com/2019/

01. Teo by Omoi feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
02. All I Need are Things I Like by PinocchioP feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
03. Love Song by LamazeP feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
MC
04. Kaisei by Orangestar feat. Hatsune Miku (R3 real-time control system)
05. Deep Sea City Underground by tanakaB feat. Kagamine Rin
06. Main Character by *Luna feat. Kagamine Len V4X
07-DAY1 BRING IT ON by GigaP feat. Kagamine Rin & Len (Kagamine Rin & Len 10th anniversary)
07-DAY2 Roki by MikitoP feat. Kagmine Rin
07-DAY3 Romeo and Cinderella by doriko feat. Hatsune Miku
08-DAY1 Karakuri Pierrot by 40mP feat. Hatsune Miku
08-DAY2 Sand Planet by Hachi feat. Hatsune Miku (Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary)
08-DAY3 Karakuri Pierrot by 40mP feat. Hatsune Miku
09-DAY1 Catch the Wave by kz feat. Hatsune Miku (Project DIVA MEGA39’s/Mega Mix)
09.DAY2 Animal Fortune-Telling by scop feat. Hatsune Miku
09-DAY3 Catch the Wave by kz feat. Hatsune Miku (Project DIVA MEGA39’s/Mega Mix)
10-DAY1 Baby Maniacs By HachioujiP feat. Hatsune Miku
10-DAY2 Baby Maniacs By HachioujiP feat. Hatsune Miku
10-DAY3 BRING IT ON by GigaP feat. Kagamine Rin & Len (Kagamine Rin & Len 10th anniversary)
11. Kill Carry On by Police Paccadilly feat. Hatsune Miku
12. A Plan is Still in Progress Covertly by Shinra feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2019 Song Contest)
13. Ramnade Blue Longing by Aoto Kei feat. MEIKO
14. Never Die by Yuyoyuppe feat. Megurine Luka
15-DAY1 Stardust Utopia by otetsu feat. Megurine Luka (V4X remake)
15-DAY2 Stardust Utopia by otetsu feat. Megurine Luka (V4X remake)
15-DAY3 Dreamin Chuchu by emon feat. Megurine Luka (together with Hatsune Miku & Kagamine Rin)
16-DAY1 Luka Luka★Night Fever by samfree feat. Megurine Luka
16-DAY2 Just be Friends by Dixie Flatline feat. Megurine Luka
16-DAY3 Luka Luka★Night Fever by samfree feat. Megurine Luka
17. Even If It’s Your Happiness by HeavenzP feat. Megurine Luka
18. Jump for Joy by EasyPop feat. Hatsune Miku & Megurine Luka (Megurine Luka 10th anniversary)
BAND MEMBER INTRODUCTION
19. Ohedo Julia-Night by Mitchie M feat. Hatsune Miku & KAITO
20. With Your Steady Eyes by Mitchie M feat. Hatsune Miku
21. HIBANA by DECO＊27 feat. Hatsune Miku
22. Greenlights Serenade by Omoi feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2018 theme song)
MC 
23. Until I Throw My Dreams Away and Become an Adult by Kasamura Touta feat. Hatsune Miku

ENCORE
24-DAY1 Unknown Mother Goose by wowaka feat. Hatsune Miku
24-DAY2 World’s End Dancehall by wowaka feat. Hatsune Miku
24-DAY3 Rolling Girl by wowaka feat. Hatsune Miku
25. Hand in Hand by kz feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2015 theme song)
26. Bless Your Breath by Wada Takeaki feat. Hatsune Miku (Magical Mirai 2019 theme song)

ライブ最終公演が終了！これで、初音ミク「マジカルミライ 2019」全日程が終了しました！6日間の動員数はライブ・企画展合わせ、約5万人となりました！ご来場の皆様ありがとうございました！！https://t.co/UU22L8ZrcQ #マジカルミライ2019 #初音ミク #鏡音リン #鏡音レン #巡音ルカ #MEIKO #KAITO pic.twitter.com/qSj8fHbxOs

— 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) September 1, 2019

Following the closing performance in Tokyo also comes the announcement for Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2020! The event will be held at INTEX Osaka in Osaka on August 7th~9th, 2020, and Makuhari Messe in Tokyo on December 18th~20th, 2020.

The announcement came as the performance came to a close, and it sure had the crowd shook in excitement! Be sure to follow the official Magical Mirai Twitter if you haven’t already, and stay tuned for more info!

Magical Mirai 2020 https://magicalmirai.com/2020/
Magical Mirai Twitter https://twitter.com/magicalmirai

初音ミク「マジカルミライ 2020」は、2020年8月7日（金）～9日（日）にインテックス大阪、12月18日（金）～20日（日）に幕張メッセで開催します！ https://t.co/E9fUjxmNW0

#マジカルミライ2020 #マジカルミライ2019 #初音ミク #鏡音リン #鏡音レン #巡音ルカ #MEIKO #KAITO pic.twitter.com/e99Qv6u9d7

— 初音ミク マジカルミライ 公式 (@magicalmirai) September 1, 2019

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Tokyo Concert Setlist (Spoilers!), Magical Mirai 2020 Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Sports Hochi to Release Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Special Issue, Cover by Kanzaki Hiro
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
The sports tabloid newspaper Sports Hochi will be releasing a special issue covering the upcoming Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 events this month with cover illustration by Kanzaki Hiro! The issue will cover from special interviews with the creators of Magical Mirai down to its history and main visuals. You’ll find the Hatsune Miku: Magical …

The post Sports Hochi to Release Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Special Issue, Cover by Kanzaki Hiro appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The sports tabloid newspaper Sports Hochi will be releasing a special issue covering the upcoming Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 events this month with cover illustration by Kanzaki Hiro! The issue will cover from special interviews with the creators of Magical Mirai down to its history and main visuals.

You’ll find the Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 special issue for sale at both the Osaka and Tokyo venues, or at the C96 in Tokyo Big Sight on August 9th~12th, with the creator interviews and other contents as listed below:

  • Ryoji Sekimoto (Magical Mirai 2018 & 2019 producer)
  • Wada Takeaki (Magical Mirai 2019 theme song “Bless Your Breath“)
  • Shinra (Magical Mirai 2019 OFFICIAL ALBUM’s “A plan is still in progress covertly“)
  • EasyPop (Magical Mirai 2019’s 2nd theme song “Jump for Joy“)
  • Cheriko & Yuma Saito (“Bless Your Breath“‘s illustrator and animation producer)
  • How to draw with Nardack (Snow Miku 2015)
  • How to draw with Kanzaki Hiro (Oreimo, Racing Miku 2018)
  • History of Magical Mirai & Main Visuals

Additionally, the special issue will also come included with a poster, so don’t miss out!

Magical Mirai 2019 https://magicalmirai.com/2019/
Special Issue by Sports Hochi https://magicalmirai.com/2019/goods_houchi_newspaper.html

まず、C96とマジカルミライ2019で共通販売する「マジカルミライ特別号」表紙イラストをついに大公開！今回の担当はかんざきひろさんです！ #初音ミク #C96 #コミックマーケット96 #マジカルミライ2019 #マジカルミライ pic.twitter.com/AJLgd8k3eQ

— 報知@C96No.1216＆マジミラ大阪No.12 (@hochi_comiket) August 1, 2019

C96とマジカルミライ2019で共通販売するスポーツ報知「マジカルミライ特別号」にて描き下ろしイラスト1枚描かせて頂きました！インタビューと簡単なメイキングも掲載して頂いて、アクリルスタンドも発売する予定です。よろしくお願い致します
https://t.co/aVhVqy6hPh
https://t.co/QMdZxfUiXY pic.twitter.com/FeZsdUjZ4a

— Nardack (@Nardack) August 2, 2019

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Sports Hochi to Release Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 Special Issue, Cover by Kanzaki Hiro appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hitoshizuku × Yama△ “If the world3” Album to be Released at Comiket 96!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The iconic duo Hitoshizuku x Yama△ is going back to Comic Market 96 this year, bringing us a whole new installments of their fairy tale-themed albums: “If the world3“! Album Details and Crossfade Video Those who follow this iconic producer duo know very well how their songs usually take inspiration from themes such as fairy …

The post Hitoshizuku × Yama△ “If the world3” Album to be Released at Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The iconic duo Hitoshizuku x Yama△ is going back to Comic Market 96 this year, bringing us a whole new installments of their fairy tale-themed albums: “If the world3“!

Album Details and Crossfade Video

Those who follow this iconic producer duo know very well how their songs usually take inspiration from themes such as fairy tales and folklore stories, often even creating their own series through vocaloid songs. “If the world3” is their third album based off of fairy tales-inspired songs, and aims to bring back the magic of iconic stories we probably even read back when we were just children!

You might have been able to recognize some of the voices, even VY2 and the VOCALOID5 voice library Ken made their appearances in this album! Let’s check the track list together!

Track list

  1. Intermezzo
    Vocal: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, Camui Gackpo, GUMI, IA, MAYU, VY2, Ken
  2. Queen Thumbelina (Inspired by “Thumbelina“)
    Vocal: Kagamine Rin & Len, KAITO, Camui Gackpo, VY2
  3. Alice in N.Y. (Inspired by “Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland“)
    Vocal: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, Camui Gackpo, GUMI, IA, MAYU
  4. Katatsuki no Shura (Inspired by “Kintarō“)
    Vocal: Camui Gackpo
  5. Akasha’s Traveler (Inspired by “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp“)
    Vocal: KAITO
  6. Gift (Inspired by “Urashima Tarō“)
    Vocal: Kagamine Rin & Len
  7. To the Star of Bethlehem (Inspired by “The Little Match Girl“)
    Vocal: Hatsune Miku

We got to listen to Alice in N.Y. not long ago, but we are so happy to see more amazing songs coming in this album! In addition, Suzunosuke‘s artworks give the characters such an enchanting look, perfect for fairy tales!

Limited Edition with Merchandise Pack

This album comes in both standard and limited edition, and the latter also includes a merchandise set!

Priced only 3,000 JPY (event only price), this special edition comes with:

  • “If the world3” album
  • “Alice in N.Y.” Tote-bag
  • Two can badges (Alice’s one is always included, while the second one will be picked randomly among the other four designs)
  • “Alice in N.Y.” Mini Towel (Pink version)
  • “Queen Thumbelina” Character Postcards (Set of 6)

Both of those editions will be available through teamOS‘s booths during Comic Market 96 and Magical Mirai 2019’s Creators Market, so keep your eyes wide open for them if you manage to attend!

Buy it Online as Well!

As you could have guessed from the mini towel, you can also buy the album online via Toranoana, Melonbooks and Animate Online Shop!

Both standard and limited editions are almost the same, made exception of the mini towel which will be white and blue instead. Below you can find all the links!

  • Toranoana – Standard can be found here for 1,500 JPY, while the limited edition is here and priced 4,532 JPY. Tax fees are not included!
  • Melonbooks – Standard can be found here for 1,620 JPY, while the limited edition is here and priced 4,895 JPY.
  • Animate Online Shop – Only standard edition available, priced 1,620 JPY. Click here to check it out!

The limited edition is bond to go sold out very fat so you better place your order as soon as possible!

Remember that you might need some help to obtain the album outside Japan!

Source

It is always a pleasure for us to talk about incoming albums, and with TeamOS being such a legendary circle, this album would surely make a great addition to your collection! Don’t you think?

Don’t forget to follow us on VNN for more, amazing news!

You can find more about Comic Market 96 on its official website
Don’t forget to also check out Magical Mirai 2019’s official website and Twitter!
As for TeamOS’ works, you should definitely follow Hitoshizuku, Yama△ and Suzunosuke on Twitter!
Hitoshizuku and Yama△ also have a website!

The post Hitoshizuku × Yama△ “If the world3” Album to be Released at Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Chugai Mining Reveals Plastic Bottles Holders for Magical Mirai 2019!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
After pleasing Hatsune Miku fans with their trading keyholder and can badges featuring an adorable set of Piapro characters in a “Soinekkoron” pose, Chugai Mining is back for some more merchandise! Fluffy & Adorable Bottle Holders! With Magical Mirai 2019 getting closer each day, we all shouldn’t be surprised to see more merchandise featuring Hatsune …

The post Chugai Mining Reveals Plastic Bottles Holders for Magical Mirai 2019! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After pleasing Hatsune Miku fans with their trading keyholder and can badges featuring an adorable set of Piapro characters in a “Soinekkoron” pose, Chugai Mining is back for some more merchandise!

Fluffy & Adorable Bottle Holders!

With Magical Mirai 2019 getting closer each day, we all shouldn’t be surprised to see more merchandise featuring Hatsune Miku and her friends to be revealed! And this time, seems Chugai Mining brought us two adorable Plastic Bottle Holders!

【新商品情報】
「マジカルミライ 2019」限定商品ペットボトルホルダーのサンプルが到着！千助さんデザインを綺麗に刺繍で仕上げました。ぜひ中外鉱業ブースまでお越しください！ #マジカルミライ #初音ミク
マジカルミライ2019公式サイト：https://t.co/AJP6840h1R
︎https://t.co/Q4aG3M2EI1 pic.twitter.com/4K0eio7CML

— 中外鉱業 (@chugaionline) July 19, 2019

Available in two different variants, one featuring Hatsune Miku and the other one Megurine Luka, those plastic bottle holders are embroidered in fluffy fabric featuring two cute chibis drawn by Chisuke.

They also feature a carabiner, this way you can attach them easily everywhere you want!

Those items will be available only during Magical Mirai 2019 at Chugai Mining’s  booth, and will cost 1,500 JPY each!

Source

Stay tuned with us on VNN for more amazing news! More Magical Mirai merchandise is bond to appear so keep your eyes wide open!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo
Don’t forget to also check out Magical Mirai 2019’s official website and Twitter!
You can find Chugai Mining on Twitter or their website.
Booths and Merchandise details can be found here!

The post Chugai Mining Reveals Plastic Bottles Holders for Magical Mirai 2019! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Gift Kagamine Rin & Len “BRING IT ON” Plushies to be Available at Magical Mirai 2019!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Always been a fan of “BRING IT ON“, Kagamine Rin & Len‘s anniversary song composed by GigaP last year? Well, you will be extremely happy to know that Gift is going to offer us two adorable plushies based off of this same song! A Duo of Plushies for You! With a size of 20cm each, those little …

The post Gift Kagamine Rin & Len “BRING IT ON” Plushies to be Available at Magical Mirai 2019! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Always been a fan of “BRING IT ON“, Kagamine Rin & Len‘s anniversary song composed by GigaP last year? Well, you will be extremely happy to know that Gift is going to offer us two adorable plushies based off of this same song!

A Duo of Plushies for You!

With a size of 20cm each, those little plushie will make your love for the song even more snuggable itself!

They are priced 4,000 JPY each and will be available at GIFT’s booth during Magical Mirai 2019, only to be later found through their online website as well after the event’s end.

Here below you can find their pages on Gift’s webstore:

  • Kagamine Rin “BRING IT ON” Ver. Plushie
  • Kagamine Len “BRING IT ON” Ver. Plushie

If you ever manage to attend Hatsune Miku‘s most iconic event, be sure to grab your favorite before they go sold out!

More Plushies!

But there is more! Priced and sized the same as the Kagamine plushies, you will also find the Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 ver. and Racing Miku 2019 ver. plushies at their booth!

With so many adorable plushies this events seems to be filled with cutesy merchandise for everyone, and who doesn’t like to have a snuggable companion, after all! Cannot wait for more!

Stay tuned with us on VNN for more amazing news about virtual singers!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo
Don’t forget to also check out Magical Mirai 2019’s official website and Twitter!
You can find Gift on Twitter and their website!
Magical Miray Plushie Category

 

The post Gift Kagamine Rin & Len “BRING IT ON” Plushies to be Available at Magical Mirai 2019! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: DIVELA’s 1st Album “Mirai Collection” Announced!
item.dc:creator: Noffy
item.description:
About Mirai Collection DIVELA‘s 1st original album “Mirai Collection” has been announced! The album will be on sale at the Magical Mirai 2019 Creators Event in August and September. It will later release in stores on September 11th 2019. Mirai Collection will feature 11 tracks, with 3 being brand new songs. In addition, the 11th …

The post DIVELA’s 1st Album “Mirai Collection” Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
About Mirai Collection

DIVELA‘s 1st original album “Mirai Collection” has been announced! The album will be on sale at the Magical Mirai 2019 Creators Event in August and September. It will later release in stores on September 11th 2019. Mirai Collection will feature 11 tracks, with 3 being brand new songs. In addition, the 11th track is a remix of DIVELA’s song METEOR by keisei. The album will cost 2,000 JPY plus tax.

The beautiful album cover art is by Matsuda Toki. Previously they did the art for METEOR when it was uploaded to YouTube and nicovideo.

About DIVELA

DIVELA began releasing music in 2013, with the most of their works being remixes of famous Vocaloid songs. Remixes by DIVELA have appeared on albums such as “-LODESTAR-” and “Vocalostream”. Additionally, DIVELA arranged the Cool Medley for the game Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA X which released in 2016. In 2018, DIVELA won the Magical Mirai 2018 Song Contest with their original song METEOR and, Since then, they have been more actively releasing original Vocaloid songs on nicovideo and YouTube.

Mirai Collection Crossfade

Tracklist

  1. 39℃
  2. METEOR
  3. BEAT SYNCER
  4. Haikei You o Abiru Chijou no Kimi e
  5. DITHER TUNE
  6. DERERE
  7. VIVID HERO
  8. Saikidou
  9. MIRAI GAZER
  10. Soko ni Inochi wa Arimasu ka.
  11. METEOR keisei REMIX

Release dates

Mirai Collection will be sold at the Magical Mirai Creators Market on August 10th – 11th and August 30th – September 1st. On August 10th – 11th, DIVELA will be at table A-3 for the Osaka event, and on August 30th – September 1st, they will be at table B-1 for the Tokyo event.

For those who can not attend either event, the album is already available online for pre-order and will be released on September 11th!
You can find the album at the following retailers:

  • Amazon
  • Tower Records
  • VV Store
  • Animate
  • Toranoana

For those who live outside of Japan, Amazon Japan supports shipping of albums overseas without the need for a proxy shipping service.

DIVELA can be found on Twitter,  YouTube, nicovideo, and SoundCloud

The post DIVELA’s 1st Album “Mirai Collection” Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku x CDReco CD Drive Collaboration Visual Released, Product Details Revealed
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Following the initial announcement in June, IO DATA Japan has revealed the main visual by Irohara Kisora/Hoshino Kisora/Shirayuki Towa for their CDReco smartphone optical drive collaboration with Hatsune Miku – “MIKUReco”. The MIKUReco will allow smartphone users to capture music from their favorite CDs into a smartphone, all done without a PC required. She’s a CDRI-W24AI2 …

The post Hatsune Miku x CDReco CD Drive Collaboration Visual Released, Product Details Revealed appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Following the initial announcement in June, IO DATA Japan has revealed the main visual by Irohara Kisora/Hoshino Kisora/Shirayuki Towa for their CDReco smartphone optical drive collaboration with Hatsune Miku – “MIKUReco”. The MIKUReco will allow smartphone users to capture music from their favorite CDs into a smartphone, all done without a PC required. She’s a CDRI-W24AI2 model.

Prior to web sales in September, IO DATA Japan will be conducting early sales at Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 in Osaka and Tokyo at a very limited amount of 400 units per venue. The MIKUReco is priced at 13,900 yen as a standalone; alternatively, you could purchase additional dressing panels featuring Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, or KAITO & MEIKO designs at 1,800 yen each.

Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019 will take place at Intex Osaka in Osaka from August 9th~11th, and Makuhari Messe in Tokyo from August 31st ~ September 1st.

MIKUReco CDRI-W24AI2 model web sale: https://www.iodata.jp/product/smartphone/goods/cdri-w24ai2391/
Dressing panels web sale: https://www.iodata.jp/product/smartphone/goods/pl-391/

MIKUReco Collaboration Site: https://www.iodata.jp/ssp/cdreco/mikureco/
Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2019: https://magicalmirai.com/2019/

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Hatsune Miku x CDReco CD Drive Collaboration Visual Released, Product Details Revealed appeared first on VNN.
